H0.text: Who was the first American President to live in the White House; he moved there in 1800. George Washington

H1.text: Who was the first American President to live in the White House; he moved there in 1800. Thomas Jefferson

H2.text: Who was the first American President to live in the White House; he moved there in 1800. James Madison

H3.text: Who was the first American President to live in the White House; he moved there in 1800. Adams 2

A4.text: On Saturday, November 1, 1800, John Adams became the first president to occupy the White House.

A5.text: Although the structure was not completed until some years after the presidency of George Washington
